blogData.title: What English Dialects are Available?
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, english, English, English dialects, AI, artificial intelligence, languages, dialects, robot, Australian, American, British, UK, US, AUS, Indian, IN, voice, voices, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
Did you know that our AI can speak in over 180 languages and more than 120 differing dialects and different genders?
It‚Äôs true! That‚Äôs one smart robot üòâ

In this article we‚Äôre focusing on English and the four different dialects that you can choose from when using our app.

For those that have you used the app before, you will notice that we have renamed the ‚Äúvoices‚Äù. Previously we had them named as EN-IN-P-M1, or UK-S4-M which didn‚Äôt make a lot of sense for those who were unfamiliar with the technology.

Now, as you‚Äôll see below the names are much more user friendly; we start with the country of origin, followed by the ‚Äúage‚Äù of the voice, the gender and whether the AI‚Äôs voice is standard (S) or professional ¬ß. Please note that standard (S) is an older version of the technology and so may sound a little more robotic than the professional ¬ß voices.

What Dialects are available in English?

We are constantly working on updating and adding new dialects to our app, at present we have four English dialects; Australian, Indian, British and American.

We‚Äôve had each voice say the phrase ‚ÄúLife is what happens when you‚Äôre busy making other plans‚Äù, so you can hear the difference between each of the voices. Fun fact! Even though John Lennon is credited for the popular quote, it was actually writer and cartoonist Allen Saunders who published it in Reader‚Äôs Digest in January 1957.

Below you can listen to each dialect and voice provided in English on our app:

Australian English

Midlife Female ¬ß

Midlife Female (S)

Midlife Male ¬ß

Midlife Male (S)

Young-Adult Female ¬ß

Young-Adult Female (S)

Young-Adult Male ¬ß

Young-Adult Male (S)

Indian English

Midlife Male ¬ß

Midlife Male (S)

Young-Adult Female ¬ß

Young-Adult Female (S)

Young-Adult Male ¬ß

Young-Adult Male (S)

British English

Midlife Female ¬ß

Midlife Female (S)

Midlife Male ¬ß

Midlife Male (S)

Young-Adult Female ¬ß

Young-Adult Female (S)

Young-Adult Male ¬ß

Young-Adult Male (S)

American English

Midlife Female (S)

Midlife Female 1 ¬ß

Midlife Female 2 ¬ß

Midlife Male ¬ß

Midlife Male (S)

Young-Adult Female ¬ß

Young-Adult Female (S)

Young-Adult Male (S)

Young-Adult Male 1 ¬ß

Young-Adult Male 2 ¬ß

Conclusion

And there you have it! Examples of all the AI English dialects that are currently available on the videotranslator.ai app. Stay tuned as we continue to update our database and for further articles displaying our AI in other languages and dialects.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: 10 Hard To Translate Indonesian Words

nodes.title: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?
nodes.description: Ever get confused on which dialect you should choose when you are translating a video using our tool? This article will help you choose the right dialect!
nodes.coverAlt: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?
